description:
In short: an old lover gave me a little piglet.

Qin Zhuopu, a workaholic, has been single for many years. As he reaches middle age, his family is desperate for a child.

Until one day...

'Mr. Qin, your son is already in primary school!'

'???' I have only had one boyfriend!

Seven years after the breakup, the old lover returned to the wealthy family with a little fat pig in his arms: 'Zaizai is a big eater, I can't feed him. Zaizai’s primary school homework is too difficult, I can’t do it. I'll give you guardianship from now on! Will you let me go to your construction site to move bricks? Son, say ‘Mommy’!'

Mr. Qin: (No, I couldn't give birth to such a fat kid!)

Later...

Onlookers: I heard that Mr. Qin has adopted an illegitimate child born to his old lover by some woman?

Mr. Qin: Let me introduce to you, this is my own cub!>
